It's kind of off topic here but it was posted to a creation/evolution messageboard. I'll leave the name of to protect the person's identity though.
 
 God never intended for man to venture out into space on his own. That's why the shuttle blew up. There is also a very scientific and historical reason why no astronaut ever died IN SPACE. 
 
 Well, there you have it. Who can argue against logic like that? emoticon_confused
 
 You can find the thread here. 
 
 Shuttle disaster proves man doesn't belong in space
